DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Page Editor's Context Menu Options - Availability
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Available Options

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Using the publish scheduled function, this page will be published automatically on the set date/time.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: By setting the release date, this page will be visible online from the chosen date/time onwards (if published).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: By setting the expiration date, this page will be online (if published) until this date/time and then will disappear from the public website but will still remain as a resource in OpenCms.
